message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $85 right now. Let me know what you think!
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I can do $110, which is a bit closer to my minimum price. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $110 is still a little too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95.  If we can meet in the middle, I think we can make a deal.

I'm glad you're willing to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm still a bit far from my minimum price. I can do $105, which is a compromise, but I'm hoping we can get a bit closer to what I'm looking for. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. How about $98? I'm hoping we can come to an agreement here.
